subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: If baseball players and owners do not agree to a new labor contract by Aug. 1, the union has until Aug. 15 to unilaterally end the new drug policy when the current collective bargaining agreement expires.
snippet: If baseball players and owners do not agree to a new labor contract by Aug. 1, the union has until Aug. 15 to unilaterally end the new drug policy when the current collective bargaining agreement expires.
